Detailed Description

cvmx_usbdrd::_uahc_erstsz#

For information on this register, refer to the xHCI Specification, v1.0, section 5.5.2.3.1.

This register can be reset by NCB reset, or USBDRD()_UCTL_CTL[UAHC_RST], or USBDRD()_UAHC_GCTL[CORESOFTRESET], or USBDRD()_UAHC_USBCMD[HCRST], or USBDRD()_UAHC_USBCMD[LHCRST].
